DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this study is to determine whether markers of vascular inflammation (such as c-reactive protein) can predict endothelial dysfunction (as measured by flow-mediated dilation) in postmenopausal women with glucose intolerance compared to normal controls.
DOC.brief_title: C-Reactive Protein and Endothelial Dysfunction in Women With Glucose Intolerance
DOC.criteria: healthy postmenopausal women ages 4065 smokers diabetes requiring medication
